# Starting spark
print("Moro maailma!")

# Get required libraries
%pip install openpyxl
import pyspark as ps 
import pandas as pd
import openpyxl
## Reading the files to pd dataframes

# Define path and file name
lakehouse_path = "abfss://sotkanet-data@group1adls.dfs.core.windows.net/"
filename = "Psykologia.xlsx"

# read to df frame with modular path
df_psykologia = pd.read_excel(f"{lakehouse_path}{filename}", engine='openpyxl', header=1)

# Read other files
filename = "Paihde.xlsx"
df_paihde = pd.read_excel(f"{lakehouse_path}{filename}", engine='openpyxl', header=1)

filename = "VaikuttavatTekijat.xlsx"
df_vaikuttavat = pd.read_excel(f"{lakehouse_path}{filename}", engine='openpyxl', header=1)

# Write new headers as a list

new_headers = ["Kunta", "Kuntanumero", "Masennuslaakkeista korvausta saaneet 0-17v",
"Masennuslaakkeista korvausta saaneet 18-64v", "Kuntoutuspsykoterapiaa saaneet 25-65v", "Psykiatrian laitoshoidon potilaat"]

# Insert as headers
df_psykologia.columns = new_headers




# Define the columns that need to be converted from per 1,000 to percentages
columns_to_convert = [
    "Masennuslaakkeista korvausta saaneet 18-64v",
    "Kuntoutuspsykoterapiaa saaneet 25-65v",
    "Psykiatrian laitoshoidon potilaat"
]

df_psykologia[columns_to_convert] = (df_psykologia[columns_to_convert] / 10)

df_psykologia.head()
